mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_customer(customer_email, customer_nm, customer_tel, customer_post, customer_address, customer_address_detail, t_membership_seq) VALUES(#{customer_email}, #{customer_nm}, #{customer_tel}, #{customer_post}, #{customer_address}, #{customer_address_detail}, 1)
